summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of the southeasterly 130 feet, more or less, of the Alley in Block 11, Heirs of Sarah A. Bell Addition, being the Alley between 6th Avenue and 7th Avenue, from Stewart Street to a connection with the existing pavement 130 feet, more or less, northwesterly of Stewart Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; Local Improvement District No. 5552, and appropriating money therefor.
